title: Integral test for convergence of a series

content.prompt: Let f be a positive, continuous, decreasing function such that a n =f( n ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CED@ . If ∑ n=1 ∞ a n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF1@ converges to k, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: lim n→∞ a n =k MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41F9@

∫ 1 n f ( x )dx=k MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41BE@

∫ 1 ∞ f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4046@ diverges

∫ 1 ∞ f ( x )dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4046@ converges

∫ 1 ∞ f ( x )dx=k MathType@MTEF@5@5@@423C@

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Confirm whether hypotheses or conditions of a selected definition, theorem, or test have been satisfied.
